Function Documentation

void sighnd_setup ( void   ) 

Setup signals as follows:

  • SIGUP: do nothing
  • SIGUSR1: toggle debug mode
  • SIGINT, SIGQUIT, SIGTERM: terminate clockd

Referenced by mainloop_run().
